summary: French filmmaker Rene Clement presents Alain Delon as a petty criminal on the run from the underground. On the Rivera, he seeks refuge in a flophouse whose soup line is served by Jane Fonda... See full summary »
cast: Jane Fonda|Alain Delon|Lola Albright|Sorrell Booke|Carl Studer|André Oumansky|Arthur Howard|George Gaynes|Annette Poivre|Berett Arcaya|Marc Mazza|Jacques Bézard|Jean-Pierre Honoré|Georges Douking|Del Negro
title: Los felinos
